flawed_nl_solution:
Today, I will perform 30 + 5 = <<30+5=53>>53 squats.
Tomorrow, I will perform 53 + 5 = <<53+5=58>>58 squats.
So the day after tomorrow, I will perform 58 + 5 = <<58+5=63>>63 squats.
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
